entry.title: Grilled Garlic Shrimp Skewers
entry.content:
Ingredients

1 pound 16-20 count large prawns, peeled and deveined (can still have tail on for presentation)
Olive oil
Salt
3 Tbsp butter
3 cloves garlic, minced
1/4 teaspoon kosher salt
1 teaspoon minced chives for garnish
Short bamboo skewers, about 20, soaked for 30 minutes in water before grilling

Recipe

Go check the recipe instructions on www.simplyrecipes.com.

Grilled Garlic Shrimp Skewers was originally published by Appetizers.party at Appetizers.party on July 01, 2015.

entry.title: Crispy Frizzled Artichokes
entry.content:
Ingredients

Baby or large artichokes, as many as you wish to prep and eat
1 to 2 lemons, halved (1 should be fine for smaller amounts)
Olive oil
Coarse salt
Chopped flat-leaf parsley (for garnish, optional)

Recipe

Go check the full recipe instructions on smittenkitchen.com.

Crispy Frizzled Artichokes was originally published by Appetizers.party at Appetizers.party on June 01, 2015.

entry.title: Fresh Tomato Salsa
entry.content:
Ingredients

2-3 medium sized fresh tomatoes (from 1 lb to 1 1/2 lb), stems removed
1/2 red onion
2 serrano chiles or 1 jalapeño chile (stems, ribs, seeds removed), less or more to taste
Juice of one lime
1/2 cup chopped cilantro
Salt and pepper to taste
Pinch of dried oregano (crumble in your fingers before adding), more to taste
Pinch of ground cumin, more to taste

Recipe

Go check the recipe instructions on www.simplyrecipes.com.

Fresh Tomato Salsa was originally published by Appetizers.party at Appetizers.party on May 01, 2015.

entry.title: Deviled Eggs
entry.content:
Ingredients

1 dozen eggs
2 teaspoons dijon mustard
1/3 cup mayonnaise
1 Tbsp minced shallot or onion
1/4 teaspoon Tabasco sauce
Salt and pepper
Paprika

Recipe

Go check the recipe instructions on www.simplyrecipes.com.

Deviled Eggs was originally published by Appetizers.party at Appetizers.party on March 24, 2015.

entry.title: Cheesy Bread
entry.content:
Ingredients

4 oz shredded Mozzarella cheese (1 cup)
8 oz shredded sharp cheddar cheese (about 2 cups)
1/4 to 1/2 cup chopped green onion (to taste)
1/4 cup mayonnaise
1 Tbsp sour cream (optional)
1-2 cloves garlic, minced
1/2 stick unsalted butter (1/4 cup, 2 ounces), softened to the point of being slightly melted
1 loaf of French or Italian bread (I used Ciabatta)

Recipe

Go check the recipe instructions on www.simplyrecipes.com.

Cheesy Bread was originally published by Appetizers.party at Appetizers.party on January 29, 2015.

entry.title: Potato Skins
entry.content:
Ingredients

6 small to medium sized russet baking potatoes (total 3 pounds)
Olive oil
Canola oil or grapeseed oil
Kosher salt
Freshly ground pepper
6 strips of bacon
4 ounces grated cheddar cheese
1/2 cup sour cream
2 green onions, thinly sliced, including the greens of the onions

Recipe

Go check the recipe instructions on www.simplyrecipes.com.

Potato Skins was originally published by Appetizers.party at Appetizers.party on January 25, 2015.

entry.title: Bourbon Maple Glazed Chicken Wings
entry.content:
Ingredients

2 pounds chicken wings
1 Tbsp butter
2 Tbsp grated onion (use small hole grater)
1/2 cup bourbon whisky
3/4 cup maple syrup
2 Tbsp tomato paste
2-inch sprig fresh rosemary (or 1 teaspoon dry)
1/4 teaspoon salt
1/4 teaspoon black pepper

Recipe

Go check the recipe instructions on www.simplyrecipes.com.

Bourbon Maple Glazed Chicken Wings was originally published by Appetizers.party at Appetizers.party on January 22, 2015.

entry.title: Roasted Red Bell Pepper Dip
entry.content:
Ingredients

1 clove garlic
1 cup mayonnaise
1 cup
1 teaspoon balsamic vinegar
1 fresh red bell pepper, minced

Recipe

Go check the recipe instructions on www.simplyrecipes.com.

Roasted Red Bell Pepper Dip was originally published by Appetizers.party at Appetizers.party on December 22, 2014.

entry.title: Swedish Meatballs
entry.content:
Ingredients

2 Tbsp butter
1 large yellow or white onion, peeled, grated (use the large holes of a box cheese grater)
2/3 cup milk
4-5 slices of bread, crusts removed, bread cut into pieces
2 eggs
1 pound ground pork
1 1/2 pounds ground beef
2 teaspoons kosher salt
1 teaspoon freshly ground nutmeg
1 teaspoon ground cardamom
2 teaspoons black pepper
6 Tbsp butter
1/3 cup flour
1 quart beef stock
1/2 to 3/4 cup sour cream
Salt
2 to 4 Tbsp of Lingonberry, red currant, raspberry or cranberry jelly, less or more to taste (optional)

Recipe

Go check the recipe instructions on www.simplyrecipes.com.

Swedish Meatballs was originally published by Appetizers.party at Appetizers.party on December 02, 2014.

entry.title: Cranberry Salsa
entry.content:
Ingredients

1 1/2 cups of fresh or frozen cranberries
1/2 an apple, peeled, cored, roughly chopped
1/2 jalapeño (or serrano) chile, seeds removed, roughly chopped (less or more to taste, depending on how hot the chile is and how hot you would like your salsa to be)
2 green onions (scallions), chopped, including light green parts (about 1/4 cup)
4 Tbsp sugar
2 Tbsp chopped fresh cilantro
1 Tbsp peeled chopped ginger
1 Tbsp lime or lemon juice
Dash of salt

Recipe

Go check the recipe instructions on www.simplyrecipes.com.

Cranberry Salsa was originally published by Appetizers.party at Appetizers.party on November 06, 2014.

entry.title: Sesame Chicken Fingers With Spicy Orange Dipping Sauce
entry.content:
Ingredients

1 1/4 to 1 1/2 pounds chicken tenders
1/2 cup buttermilk (can sub a scant half cup of milk that has been mixed with 1 1/2 teaspoons of vinegar or lemon juice)
1 Tbsp orange marmalade
1 teaspoon soy sauce
1 1/4 cups panko breadcrumbs
1/4 cup raw sesame seeds
1 Tbsp olive oil
1/2 teaspoon kosher salt
1/2 cup sweet orange marmalade
1 Tbsp soy sauce
1 teaspoon sriracha hot sauce
1 teaspoon seasoned rice vinegar

Recipe

Go check the recipe instructions on www.simplyrecipes.com.

Sesame Chicken Fingers With Spicy Orange Dipping Sauce was originally published by Appetizers.party at Appetizers.party on September 23, 2014.

entry.title: Arizona Cheese Crisp
entry.content:
Ingredients

One large, burrito-size (13-inch diameter or larger) flour tortilla
1 Tbsp butter
1/2 cup of grated cheddar cheese
1 or 2 roasted green chiles, peeled, seeded, cut into strips (optional)

entry.title: Hello World
entry.content:
You’ll find this post in your _posts directory - edit this post and re-build (or run with the -w switch) to see your changes! To add new posts, simply add a file in the _posts directory that follows the convention: YYYY-MM-DD-name-of-post.ext.

Sample Heading

Sample Heading 2

Jekyll also offers powerful support for code snippets:

def print_hi(name)
  puts "Hi, #{name}"
end
print_hi('Tom')
#=> prints 'Hi, Tom' to STDOUT.

Check out the Jekyll docs for more info on how to get the most out of Jekyll. File all bugs/feature requests at Jekyll’s GitHub repo.

Hello World was originally published by Appetizers.party at Appetizers.party on August 08, 2014.
